thoughts.text: I think I will start by listing the files in the current directory to get a sense of what resources are available to me.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in the directory will give me a sense of what resources are available to me and help me plan my next steps.
thoughts.plan:
- List files in the current directory
- Review the list of files to determine what resources are available
- Decide on next steps based on available resources
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to waste time reviewing irrelevant files and to stay focused on my goals.
thoughts.speak: I will start by listing the files in the current directory.
